text: Malaika jwa ntai gwagombile lipenga lyakwe, gujikoposhele ula ja maganga na moto uanganyishe na minyai, guileshelwe pai, nngabhanyaga shilambo showe pa tatu, shipande shimo gushitinishe, na nngabhanyaga mikongo jowe patatu, lipungu limo lya mikongo gulitinishe, na maamba gowe ganashibhii gugatinishe.
